title: TrustLineEntryExt

Liabilities.description:
Liabilities is an XDR Struct defines as:

```text struct Liabilities { int64 buying; int64 selling; }; ```

TrustLineEntryExtensionV2Ext.description:
TrustLineEntryExtensionV2Ext is an XDR NestedUnion defines as:

```text union switch (int v) { case 0: void; } ```

TrustLineEntryV1Ext.description:
TrustLineEntryV1Ext is an XDR NestedUnion defines as:

```text union switch (int v) { case 0: void; case 2: TrustLineEntryExtensionV2 v2; } ```
